dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HRES 71 IH: Condemning the Government of Mexico for failing to fulfill its water deliveries on an annual basis to the United States under the treaty between the United States and Mexico regarding the utilization of the Colorado and Tijuana Rivers and of the Rio Grande.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. De La Cruz (for herself, Mr. Nehls, Mr. Ellzey, Mr. Weber of Texas, Mr. Jackson of Texas, Mr. Crenshaw, and Mr. Roy) submitted the following resolution; which was referred to the Committee on Foreign Affairs

form.official-title: Condemning the Government of Mexico for failing to fulfill its water deliveries on an annual basis to the United States under the treaty between the United States and Mexico regarding the utilization of the Colorado and Tijuana Rivers and of the Rio Grande.

section.text: That the House of Representatives condemns the Government of Mexico for failing to fulfill its water deliveries on an annual basis to the United States under the treaty between the United States and Mexico regarding the utilization of the Colorado and Tijuana Rivers and of the Rio Grande.
